CHAPTER.VERS: A kipat cil-in Pasian in vantung le leitung a piangsak hi.
Leitung in limlemel nei loin a awngthawlpi ahi hi. Tuipi tung tengah khua mial bikbek a, tua tui tungah Pasian’ Kha in na a sem hi.
Pasian in, “Khuavak om hen,” ci hi; tua ciangin khuavak om pah hi.
Pasian in tua khuavak hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi. Pasian in khuamial panin khuavak khen khia hi.
Pasian in khuavak pen “Sun” ci a, khuamial pen “Zan” ci hi. Nitak hong bei-in, zingsang hong tunga, ni khat ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Tuite’ laizangah van kuumpi om henla, tua van kuumpi in tui le tui kikhensak hen,” ci hi.
Pasian in van kuumpi bawl a, van kuumpi tunga om tuite le van kuumpi nuai-a om tuite a khen hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in van kuumpi pen “Vantung” ci hi. Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, ni nih ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Vantungte nuai-a om tuite mun khatah kikhawm henla, lei keu kidawk hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in lei keu pen “Leitung” ci a, a kikaikhawm tuite pen “Tuipi” ci hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Pasian in, “Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piangsak henla, tang a nei kungnote, a gah sungah tang a om singgah kungte, amau’ nam ciatin leitungah piangsak hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.

Leitung in kung tuamtuamte piang khiasak a, kungnote in amau’ nam ciatin tang piangsakin, singkung in a sungah tang a om gahte piangsakin, amau’ nam ciatciatin piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, ni thum ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Sun le zan a khen dingin vantungah khuavakte om hen; tuate pen pawi hun le khuahun, ni le kumte khen nading hi henla,
leitung khua a vaksak dingin vantungah khuavak hi uh hen,” ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in khuavak lian nih bawl a, khuavak lian zaw pen sun a uk ding, khuavak neu zaw pen zan a uk dingin bawl a, amah in aksite zong a bawl hi.
Leitungah khua a vaksak ding, sun le zan a uk ding, khuamial panin khuavak a khen khia dingin Pasian in vantungah tuate a koih hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, ni li ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Tuite in a nungta ganhing honpite piangsak henla, vantung kantanin leitungah vasate leeng tahen,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in tuipi ganhing golpite le amau nam ciatin tuipi sungah tampi a pha, nuntakna a nei a gamtang thei ganhing namkim le kha a nei vasa khempeuh amau nam ciatin a piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, “Ci pha-in tampi pha-in, tuipi sung dim unla, leitungah vasate tampi pha un,” ci hi.
Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, a ni nga ni ahi hi.
Pasian in, “Nuntakna a nei ganhingte amau nam ciatin leitung in piangsak hen: Innsa, gamsa le a bokvak ganhingte amau nam ciatin piang tahen,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Innsa, gamsa le a bokvak ganhing khempeuh amau nam ciatin Pasian in a piangsak hi. Pasian in tua pen hoih hi, ci-in a mu hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Eima lim, eimah hong sunin mihing bawl ni. Tuipi ngasate tung, huihlak vasate tung, ganhingte tung le leitunga, a bokvakte tungah ukna neisak ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ama lim bangin mihing piangsakin, Pasian’ lim bangin amah a piangsak hi. Amah in numei le pasal a piangsak hi.
Pasian in amaute thupha pia a, Pasian in amaute tungah, “Ci pha-in tampi pha unla, leitung dimin zo un. Tuipi ngasate tung, leitungah a gamtang, a nungtate tungah ukna nei ta un,” a ci hi.
Pasian in, “En un, leitung maitang khempeuh ah a om, tang a piangsak kungno khempeuh le a gah sungah tang a om singkung khempeuh note tungah kong pia khinta hi. Tuate an-in na nei ding uh hi.
Leitung ganhing khempeuhte tung, huihlak vasate tung, leitungah a bokvakte tung, nuntakna hu a neite tungah an dingin kung hing khempeuh kong pia khinta hi,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin a piang pah hi.
Pasian in a bawlsa khempeuh en a, hoihsa mahmah hi. Nitak hong bei-in zingsang hong tunga, a ni guk ni ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin vantung, leitung le a sunga omte kiman khin hi.
Ni sagih ma-in Pasian in a nasepte zo khinta a, ama hihsa nasep khempeuh panin ni sagih ni-in a tawlnga hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in ni sagih ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh piansak nasepna ama nasep khempeuh panin tua ni-in Pasian a tawlnga hi. Eden Huanah Mi
Hihte pen, a kipiansak lai-a vantung le leitung tangthu ahi hi. Topa Pasian in leitung le vantungte a bawl hi.
Topa Pasian in leitungah guah zusak nai lo a, leitang a kho ding mi om lo ahih manin gam sung kungnote lei sungah om nai lo a, lo sung ankungte po khia lo hi.
Tua ciangin leitung panin meii lum kaaito-in, lei maitang khempeuh a buah hunin
Topa Pasian in leilak pan a leivui tawh mihing bawl a, a nak sungah nuntakna hu sang suk hi. Tua mi pen leitung nuntakna a nei mihing hong suak pah hi.
Topa Pasian in nisuahna lamah Eden huan khat bawl hi. Tua lai munah ama bawlsa mipa koih hi.
A deihhuai, nek dinga a hoih singkung nam khempeuh, huan laizangah nuntakna singkung le a pha le a sia theihna singkung, lei sung panin Topa Pasian in posak hi.
Huan sung a kawtsak dingin Eden nawkin gun khat hong luang a, tua mun panin gun hong kikhenin li hong pha hi.
A masa pen gun a min Pishon hi a, kham a omna, Havilah gambup kimkotah a luang pen ahi hi.
Tua gam a khamte hoih hi. Tua munah bedolak singnai le onik suang om hi.
A nihna gun min Gihon hi a, Kush gam kimkotah a luang pen ahi hi.
Assiria gam nisuahna lamah a luang a thumna gun min Hiddekel ahi hi. A lina gun pen Eufratis gun ahi hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa la-in, Eden huan kho-in a kem dingin a koih hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa thu pia a, “Na ut utin huan sung singkung gah khempeuh na ne thei ding hi.
Ahih hangin a pha le a sia theihna singkung gah pen na ne kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua na nek ni-in na si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Mipa amah guak a om ding hoih lo hi. Ama ading a kituak a huh ding ka bawlsak ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in gam sung ganhing khempeuh le huihlak vasa khempeuh lei tawh bawl a, mipa in tuate bang a ci hiam ci-in a theih nadingin mipa kiangah tuate a paipih hi. Nuntakna a nei khempeuhte pen mipa’ cih bangbang a min hi pahpah hi.
Mipa in ganhing nam khempeuh, huihlak vasa khempeuh le gam sung ganhing khempeuh min a vawh hi. Ahih hangin mipa a’ dinga a kilawm, amah a huh ding khat zong om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in mipa ihmut suaksak mahmah a, ama ihmut kalin a nakguhte khat la-in tua mun pen satak tawh a dimsak hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa’ tung panin a lak khiat nakguh pen numei khatin bawl a, mipa kiangah tua nu a paipih hi.
Tua ciangin mipa in, “Tu petpetin hih pen keima guhte le keima sate ahi hi. Amah pen mipa sung panin a kila khia ahih manin ‘Numei’ kici ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm a, amau tegel pum khat a bang uh hi.
Mipa le a zi a guaktangin om uh a, maizum lo uh hi.

Mi’ Thuman lohna Tu-in gulpi pen, Topa Pasian’ bawlsa gamlak ganhing dangte sangin ngiansiam zaw hi. Amah in numei kiangah, “Pasian in, ‘Huan sung singgah khat peuhpeuh ne lo ding,’ hong ci ahi hiam?” ci hi.
Numei in gulpi kiangah, “Huan sung singgahte ka ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in, ‘Huan laizang a om singgah na ne kei ding uh hi, zong na lawng kei ding uh hi. Tua bang hih le-uhcin na si ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin gulpi in numei kiangah, “Na si kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua singgah na nek ciangun na mitte uh hong vak dinga, a pha le a sia thei-in, Pasian tawh na kibat ding lamtak uh Pasian in thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin singkung a hoihna, mi a pilsak dingin tua a gah a deihhuaina a muh ciangin, a singgah loin a ne hi. Amah in singgah kimkhat a pasal pia a, a pasal in zong a ne hi.
A nek khit phetun amau tegel in khua phawk uh a, a guaktangin a omlam uh kithei uh hi. Amaute in theitehte khui tuahin puansilh dingin a bawl uh hi.
A nitak ciangin huan sungah Topa Pasian a hong paina ging amaute in za uh a, Topa Pasian’ muh loh dingin mipa le a zi, huan sung singte lakah a bu uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa Pasian in mipa samin ama kiangah, “Koi lai-ah om na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Nangma ginna huan sungah ka za a, ka lau hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka guaktangin om ka hih manin ka bucip hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Na guaktang a na omna kua in hong gen ahi hiam? Na nek loh dinga kong thupiak singgah ne kha na hi hiam?” ci hi.
Mipa in, “Kei tawh a om dinga nong piak numei in singgah hong pia a, ke’n ka ne hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in numei kiangah, “Bangci a hici gamtat na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Numei in, “Gulpi in kei hong khem a, ka ne hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in gulpi kiangah, “Nang, hih bangin gamta khin na hih manin, ganhing khempeuhte le] gamlak ganhing khempeuhte sangin samsiatna na ngah zaw hi. Na gilpi-in lam na pai dinga, na nuntak sung tawntungin leivui na ne ding hi.
Nang le numei kikal na suanlekhakte le ama suanlekhakte kikalah kilangneihna ka omsak ding hi. Amah in na lutang hong sunim dinga, nang in ama khetul na sunim ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin numei kiangah, “Naupaiina-ah na gimna nakpitakin ka khangsak dinga, na a sapipi-in nau na nei ding hi. Ahi zongin na pasal mah na deih dinga, amah in nang tungah hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mipa kiangah, “Nang in na zi’ thu mangin, ‘Nang in na ne kei ding hi,’ ci-in nang kong thupiak singgah ne na hih ciangin, nangma hangin leitang in samsiatna ngah hi. Na nuntak tawntung gimpi-in na semin na annek ding na zong ding hi.
Ling le kiakte, nang adingin hong po khiasak dinga, nang in gamlak kungte na ne ding hi.

Lei-ah na ciahkik matengin khua-ul kai-in na na sep ciang bekin an na ne ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh lei sung panin nang hong kipiangsak a, nang, leivui na hih manin, leivui mah na suakkik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mipa in a zi’ min pen Eve, ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen mihing khempeuh’ nu ahi hi.
Topa Pasian in mipa le a zi adingin savun puan bawl a, amaute silhsak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “En un, mipa pen eite khat tawh kibang a, a pha le a sia thei hi. Amah in nuntakna singgah ne-in a hin tawntung khak loh nadingin i vaihawm ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in, amah a kipiansakna leitang a kho dingin Eden Huan panin mipa a sawl khia hi.
Amah in mipa hawl khia hi. Kherub-te le mun khempeuh a nga thei meikuang namsau pen nuntakna singkung lampi a cing dingin Eden Huan nisuahna lamah a koih hi.
Kain le Abel Tu-in mipa in ama zi Eve luppih a, amah gai-in Kain nei a, “Topa’ huhna tawh mi khat ka ngah khin hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Abel nei leuleu hi. Tu-in Abel, tuu kempa hi a, Kain, lo khopa ahi hi.
Tua hun sungin Kain in lei pan a piang gah piakna Topa’ tungah paipih a,
Abel in a tuuhon tacilte le a sa limcite paipih hi. Topa in Abel le ama piakna thusim a,
ahih hangin Kain le ama piakna thusim lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kain heh mahmah a, a mai sia hi.
Topa in Kain tungah, “Bang hangin nang heh a, bang hangin na mai sia ahi hiam?

Limtakin hih lecin, nang hong kisang lo ding ahi hiam? Limtakin na hih kei leh nang hong hih nuamin mawhna in hong buk a, nang hong uk nuam hi. Ahih hangin nang in tua mawhna na zawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Kain in a sanggampa Abel kiangah, “Gamlakah vak ni,” ci hi. Amaute gamlakah a om ciangin Kain in a sanggampa Abel a that hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Kain tungah, “Na sanggampa Abel koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka thei kei hi. Kei, ka sanggam a kempa ka hi hiam?” ci hi.
Topa in, “Bang hangin hici gamtat na hi hiam? Na sanggampa’ sisan, leilak panin kei tungah hong kiko hi.
Na sanggampa’ sisan a hup dingin a kam a ka leitang tungah tu-in nang hong kisamsiat hi.
Lo na khawh ciangin nang adingin an hong piangsak nawn lo ding hi. Nang pen a galtai, leitunga a vakvai na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kain in Topa’ tungah, “Keimah gim hong kipiakna, ka thuak zawh ding hi lo hi.

En in, tuni-in nangmah in leitung panin kei nong hawl khia a, nang kiang panin kei nong not khia hi. Kei pen a galtai, leitungah a vakvai ka hi dinga, kei hong mu peuhmah in hong that ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Tua bang hi lo ding hi. Khatpeuh in Kain a thah leh tua pa tungah a zah sagihin kithuk ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah a tuakpeuh in a thahkhak loh nadingin Topa in Kain’ tungah ciaptehna khat a koih hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ omna panin Kain pai khia-in Eden nisuahna lam Nod gam sungah a teeng hi. Kain’ Suanlekhakte
Kain in a zi luppih a, amah gai-in Enok a nei hi. Kain in khuapi khat sat a, tua khuapi min dingin ama tapa’ min tamin Enok a phuak hi.
Enok sung panin Irad suak a, Irad pen Mehujael’ pa ahi hi. Mehujael pen Methushael’ pa hi a, Methushael pen Lamek’ pa ahi hi.
Lamek in zi nih nei hi. A khat’ min Adah hi a, adang khat’ min Zillah ahi hi.
Adah in tapa Jabal nei hi. Amah pen puanbukte sungah teengin ganhing a neite’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
A sanggampa’ min Jubal hi a, laiza lasakna le tamngai tumte’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
Zillah in Tubalkain nei a, sumngo le sik nazat khempeuh a bawlte’ pianna pupi ahi hi. Tubalkain’ sanggamnu pen Naamah ahi hi.
Lamek in a zite kiangah, “Adah le Zillah aw, ka aw ngai un. Lamek’ zite aw, ka thugen ngai un. Kei hong liamsak manin mi khat, kei hong sat manin khanglai mi khat ka that khin hi.
Kain a kithah manin a zah sagihin kithukkik ahihleh, Lamek a kithah manin a zah sawmsagih le sagihin kithukkik taktak ding hi,” a ci hi. Seth’ Suanlekhakte

Adam in a zi luppih leuleu hi. Amah in tapa khat nei a, a min Seth ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Kain in Abel that ahih manin Abel’ tangin Pasian in kei adingin naupang khat hong sehsak hi,” amah in ci hi.
Seth in zong tapa khat nei a, ama min Enosh ci hi. Tua hun a kipanin mite in Topa bia-in a min lawh ding kipan ta uh hi.
Hih pen Adam’ suanlekhakte’ laibu ahi hi. Pasian in mi a piansakin, amah in Pasian tawh a kisunin a bawl hi.
Amah in numei le pasal a piangsak hi. Amaute a kipiansakin amah in amaute, “Mi,” ci a, amaute thupha a pia hi.
Adam kum za le kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin, amah a sun tapa khat nei a, Seth ci-in a min a phuak hi.
Seth a suah khit ciangin Adam kum zagiat sung nungta lai hi. Amah in tanu le tapa dang zong a nei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Adam’ nuntak hun sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmthum hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Seth kum za le kum nga a phak ciangin Enosh kici tapa khat a nei hi.
Enosh a suah khit ciangin Seth kum zagiat le kum sawmthum nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Seth’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawm le kum nih hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Enosh kum sawmkua a phak ciangin, amah in Kenan kici tapa khat nei hi.
Kenan a suah khit ciangin Enosh kum zagiat le kum sawm le kum nga nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Enosh’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum nga hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Kenan kum sawmsagih a phak ciangin, Mahalalel kici tapa khat nei hi.
Mahalalel’ suah khit ciangin Kenan kum zagiat le kum sawmli nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kenan’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawm hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Mahalalel kum sawmguk le nga a phak ciangin Jared kici tapa khat nei hi.
Jared’ suah khit ciangin Mahalalel kum zagiat le kum sawmthum nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mahalalel’ khan sungteng pen kum zagiat le kum sawmkua le kum nga hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Jared kum za le kum sawmguk le kum nih a phak ciangin Enok kici tapa khat nei hi.
Enok’ suah khit ciangin Jared kum zagiat nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jared’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmguk le kum nih hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Enok kum sawmguk le nga a phak ciangin, Methuselah kici tapa khat nei hi.
Methuselah’ suah khit ciangin kum zathum sung Enok le Pasian kikhawl a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Enok’ khan sungteng pen kum zathum le kum sawmguk le kum nga ahi hi.
Enok pen Pasian tawh kikhawl hi. Enok kimu nawn lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in amah la hi.
Methuselah kum za le kum sawmgiat le kum sagih a phak ciangin Lamek kici tapa khat nei hi.
Lamek’ suah khit ciangin Methuselah kum zasagih le kum sawmgiat le kum nih nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Methuselah’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmguk le kum kua hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Lamek kum za le kum sawmgiat le kum nih a phak ciangin tapa khat nei a,
ama min Noah phuakin, “Topa in a samsiatsa leitang panin hih pa in i nasepna le i gimnate-ah eite hong khah khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Noah’ suah khit ciangin Lamek kum zanga le kum sawmkua le kum nga nungta a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Lamek’ khan sungteng pen kum zasagih le kum sawmsagih le kum sagih hi a, tua ciangin amah si hi.
Noah kum zanga a phak khit ciangin Shem, Ham le Jafeth, tapa thum a nei hi.
Mihing A Gitlohna Leitungah mite tam dingin hong kipanin, amau’ sung panin tanute hong suah ciangin,
vana om mite in leitung mite’ tanute hoihsa uh ahih manin a deih bangun amaute zi-in a la uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in, “Mihingte sungah ka Kha om paisuak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihingte a mawh hi khinta a, kum za le kum sawmnih sung kisik nading hun kipia lai bek ding hi,” a ci hi.

Vana om mite in leitung mihing tanute luppihin, amaute in ta a neih hun laitak hitaleh tua khit hitaleh, amau’ suanlekhak Nefilim a kici mite leitungah om hi. Hih mite pen tang lai-a mi thahat, mi minthangte ahi uh hi.
Leitungah mihing a gitlohna a liatna le mihing lungsim ngaihsutna peuhmah a sia ahih ngitngetna thu Topa in mu hi.
Leitungah mihing a bawl pen Topa khial kisa a, tua thu in ama lungsim dahsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in, “Ka piansaksa mihing, ganhing, a bokvak ganhingte le huihlak vasate, leitung panin ka phiat khia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute ka bawl ka khial hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Noah in Topa’ maipha mu hi. Noah in Teembaw Bawl
Noah’ tangthu hih bang ahi hi. Noah a thuman mi khat hi a, ama khangah paubaang lo hi. Noah pen Pasian tawh kikhawl hi.
Noah in tapa thum, Shem, Ham le Jafeth a nei hi.
Tu-in Pasian’ muhna-ah leitung sia a, leitungah ngongtatna kidim hi.
Pasian in leitung en a, a kisiat gawp mu hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitungah mi khempeuh a sia-in a gamta lo kuamah om lo hi.
Pasian in Noah’ kiangah, “Mi khempeuh beisak ding ka khentat zo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ hangin leitungah ngongtatna kidim hi. En in, leitung tawh amaute ka susia khawm ding hi.
Nang adingin noah-taaksing tawh teembaw khat bawl in. Teembaw sungah a deite bawl inla, a sung le a pua kultal tui tawh zut in.
Na bawl nading dan hih bang ahi hi: Teembaw a sauna pi zali le sawmnga, a zaina pi sawmsagih le nga, a sanna pi sawmli le nga hi ding hi.
Teembaw adingin kongkhak khat bawl inla, tua tung pi khat le alang ciangah zawh bawl in. A pangah teembaw kongkhak bulh in. A dawl nuainung, a dawl nihna le a dawl thumnate bawl in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, en in, leitungah a om nuntak husanna a nei khempeuh a susia dingin leitungah tuiciin ka tungsak ding hi. Leitunga a om khempeuh si ding hi.
Ahih hangin nang tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak ding hi. Teembaw sungah nang na hong pai ding hi. Nang, na tapate, na zi le na tapate’ zite tawh na paikhawm ding uh hi.
Nuntakna a nei khempeuh nang tawh a nungta dingin nam khatah nih ciat teembaw sungah na paipih ding hi. Tuate pen a nu le a pa hi ding hi.
Vasate amau’ nam ciatin, ganhingte amau’ nam ciatin, leilakah a bokvak ganhingte peuhmah amau’ nam ciatin, a suakta dingin nam khatah nih ciat nang kiangah hong pai ding uh hi.
A kine an nam khempeuh zong la inla khol in. Tuate pen nang le amaute adingin an ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Noah zong tua bangmahin gamta a, Pasian’ thupiak khempeuh a hih hi.
Tuiciin Tua ciangin Topa in Noah kiangah, “Nang le na innkuanpih mi khempeuh teembaw sungah pai un. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih khang mite sung panin nang bek a thuman na hihna ka hong thei hi.
Ganhing siangtho nupa kop sagih, ganhing a siang lo nupa kop khat,
huihlak vasate zong nupa kop sagih, leitungah amau’ nam a manthan loh nadingin la in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ni sagih sungin sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung leitungah guah ka zusak ding hi. Ka bawlsa nuntakna a nei peuhmah leitung panin ka phiat khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Noah in zong Topa’ thupiak khempeuh a hih hi.
Leitungah tuiciin a tun lai-in Noah kum zaguk pha hi.
Tuiciin a pelh dingin Noah, a tapate, a zi le a tapate’ zite teembaw sungah pai uh hi.
Ganhing siangthote, a siang lo ganhingte, vasate, leitunga a bokvak peuhmah,
a nupa kopin Pasian in Noah a thupiaksa bangin teembaw sungah Noah tawh pai uh hi.
A ni sagih ni-in leitungah tuiciin tung hi.
Noah’ nuntak kum zaguk kum, a kha nihna, tua kha ni sawm le sagih ni-in vana om a thuk mahmah tuikhukte puakkhamin, vantung tawlette kihong hi.
Sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung leitungah guah zu hi.
Tua ni teekteekin Noah le a tapate Shem, Ham, Jafeth le Noah’ zi le a tapate’ zi thumte, amau tawh teembaw sungah a tum uh hi.
Amaute le gamsa peuhmah amau’ nam ciat, innsa khempeuh amau’ nam ciat, leitungah a bokvak peuhmah amau’ nam ciat le vasa peuhmah amau’ nam ciat, vasa namkim amau’ nam ciatin a tum uh hi.
Nuntak husanna a nei khempeuh a nupa kop ciatin Noah tawh teembaw sungah a pai uh hi.
Pasian in Noah tungah a thupiakna bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh teembaw sungah a lut khit ciangin Topa in Noah kong a khaknelh hi.
Leitungah tuiciin ni sawmli sung omden hi. Tui tam semsem a, teembaw laamto-in, leitung’ tungah khangin sangto lai hi.
Tui khangto-in leitungah tam mahmah hi. Tui tungah teembaw laam hi.
Leitungah tui khangkhang ahih manin mual sangte khempeuh tuumcip hi.
Mual liante tungah tui omto lai a, tuate tungah pi sawmnih le nih thuk-in tuumcip hi.
Leitungah a nungta khempeuh, vasate, innsate, gamsate, a honhonin leitungah a hon om ganhing khempeuh le mi khempeuh a si uh hi.
Leitungah a om, nuntakna hu a nei peuhmah a si uh hi.

Mihing, ganhing, a bokvakte le huihlak vasate, leitunga om nuntakna a nei peuhmah amah in phiat khia hi. Leitung panin amaute kiphiat khia hi. Noah le amah tawh teembaw sunga a om teng bek a suakta uh hi.
Ni za le ni sawmnga sung leitungah tui om hi.
Tuiciin Beina Ahih hangin Pasian in Noah le amah tawh teembaw sungah a om gamsate le innsate a phawk hi. Pasian in leitungah huih nungsak a, tui a kiam hi.
Tui thukte le vantung tawlette kikhak a, vantung pan a guahte kikhawlsak hi.
Leitung panin tuite kiamkiam hi. Ni za le ni sawmnga a phak ciangin tuite kiam khinta hi.
Kha sagihna, tua kha ni sawm le sagih ni-in Ararat mualtungah teembaw kinga hi.
A kha sawmna ciang dong tuite kiamkiam lai hi. Kha sawmna, tua kha ni khat ni-in mual dawnte kidawk hi.
Ni sawmli a cin ni ciangin Noah in ama bawlsa teembaw tawlet hong a,
va-ak khat khah hi. Leitung panin tuite a keu mateng leeng kawikawi hi.
Tua ciangin, leitungah tuite a kiam khin nai hiam cih a theih nadingin amah in vakhu khat khah hi.
Ahih hangin, leitung khempeuh ah tuite om lai-in, a khawl nading mu lo ahih manin teembaw-ah hong ciahkik hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut zanin a vakhu man a, teembaw sungah paipih hi.
Amah in ni sagih sung ngakin, teembaw panin a vakhu khah leuleu hi.
Nitak ciangin ama kiangah a vakhu hong ciahkik a, oliv teh a tuk khiat thak khat a mukah petin hong tunpih hi. Tua ahih ciangin leitung panin tuite kiam khinta hi, ci-in Noah in a thei hi.
Tua ciangin ni sagih sung ngak leuleu-in a vakhu khah hi. Tua vakhu pen ama kiangah hong ciahkik nawn lo hi.
Noah a khan kum zaguk le a kum khatna, a kha masa, tua kha ni masa ni-in leitung panin tuite keu hi. Noah in teembaw khuhna la khia a, khuadak hi. Lei maitang na keu ta hi.
A kha nihna, tua kha ni sawmnih le sagih ni-in leitung keu hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah kiangah,
“Nang le na zi, na tapate le na tapate’ zite, teembaw sung panin pai khia un.
Nang tawh a omkhawm nuntakna a nei khempeuh - vasate, ganhingte le leitunga a bokvak peuhmah - leitungah tampi suakin, pungin leitungah a tam theih nadingin pai khiatpih in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Noah pai khia a, a tapate le ama zi le a tapate’ zite mah tawh pai khia khawm hi.
Ganhing khempeuh, a bokvak khempeuh, vasa khempeuh, leitunga a gamtang khempeuh a innkuan kuanin teembaw panin a pai khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Noah in Topa ading biakna tau khat lam a, a siangtho ganhing khempeuh le a siangtho vasa khempeuh lak pan khat ciat la-in, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna a pia hi.

Topa in a namtui gimnam a zak ciangin, a lungsim sungah, “Mihing’ gamtatna hangin leitang ka samsiakik ngei nawn kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mihing’ lungsim ngaihsutna pen a tangval lai panin a gilo hi mawk hi. Tu-a ka hih bangin nuntakna a nei khempeuh zong ka susia ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Leitung a omlai tengin, lo pawi hun le anlak hun, a vot le a sa, khuakhal le phalbi, sun le zan bei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Noah tawh Pasian’ Thuciamna Pasian in Noah le a tapate thupha pia a, amaute tungah, “Pung unla, tampi pha-in, leitung dim un.
Note pen leitung ganhing khempeuh, huihlak vasa khempeuh, leilakah a bokvak khempeuh le tuipi ngasa khempeuh in hong kihta-in hong zahtak ding uh hi. Note’ khut sungah tuate hong kipia hi.
A nungta a gamtang peuhmah, note adingin an hi ding hi. Kung hing khempeuh ka hong piak bangin na khempeuh zong note kong pia hi.
A nuntakna ahi a sisan pen a sa tawh na ne khawm kei bek ding uh hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hong thah leh ama tungah sihna dan ka pia ding hi. A hong that ganhing peuhmah ka that dinga, a mipihte a that mi peuhmah gim ka pia ding hi.
Mi a that peuhmahte pen, midangte in amah that ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama lim bangin mi bawl hi.
“Note, pungin khang unla, leitungah tampi tak piang khia-in, tampi pha-in khang un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah le amah tawh a om a tapate kiangah,
“En un, note le note’ khit a na suanlekhakte uh le,
note tawh a om nuntakna a nei peuhmah, vasate, innsate, note tawh a om leitung gamsa peuhmah, teembaw sung panin a pai khia zahzah peuhmah tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi.
Nuntakna a nei khempeuh, tuiciin tawh susiakik ngei nawn loin, leitung a susia dingin tuiciin ka tunsakkik ngei nawn loh nadingin note tawh ka thuciamna ka kipsak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Hih pen, kei le note le note tawh a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh kikalah mailam khang tawntung ah thuciamna lim ahi hi.
Meii sungah ka sakhituihup ka kaisak a, tua pen kei le leitung kikalah thuciamna lim hi ding hi.
Vantungah meii kong kaisak ciangin meii sungah sakhituihup a kimuh leh,
kei le note le nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh ka thuciamna ka phawk ding hi. Tuite pen, nuntakna a nei khempeuh a susia ding tuiciin suakkik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Meii sungah sakhituihup a om ciangin keimah in ka en dinga, kei le leitungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh tawntung thuciamna ka phawk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian in Noah kiangah, “Hih pen, kei le leitungah a om nuntakna a nei khempeuh tawh ka kipsaksa thuciamna lim ahi hi,” a ci hi. Noah’ Zukhamna
Teembaw sung panin a pai khia Noah’ tapate, Shem, Ham le Jafeth ahi hi. Ham pen Kanaan’ pa ahi hi.
Hih Noah’ tapa thumte panin leitung buppi mi tawh hong kidim hi.
Noah pen lo kho masa pa hi a, amah in leenggui lo khat a bawl hi.
Amah in leenggahzu ne-in kham a, a puanbuk sungah bangmah silh loin a lum hi.
Kanaan’ pa Ham in a pa guaktangin a omna mu a, a pualama om a sanggam nihte kiangah a gen hi.

Tua ciangin Shem le Jafeth in puan khat la-in amau tegel’ liangko tuakah baang uh a, a nung leh lamun pai-in a pa uh’ guaktang omna a khuh uh hi. Amaute in maingat lo uh ahih manin a pa uh guaktang omna mu lo uh hi.
Noah a zukhamna panin a pilvan ciangin ama tungah a tapa Ham’ gamtatna thei a,
amah in, “Kanaan in samsiatna ngah ta henla, a sanggamte’ sila hi tahen.
Topa ka Pasian in Shem thupha pia henla, Kanaan, ama sila hisak hen.
Pasian in Jafeth pungsak henla, Shem’ puanbukte sungah amah tengsak hen. Kanaan ama sila hisak hen,” a ci hi.
Tuiciin a tun khit ciangin Noah kum zathum le kum sawmnga nungta hi.
Noah’ khan sungteng pen kum zakua le kum sawmnga hi a, tua ciangin amah a si hi.
Hihte pen Noah’ tapa Shem, Ham le Jafeth-te’ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Tuiciin tun khit ciangin amau sung panin tapate hong piang hi.
Jafeth’ tapate: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan le Tiras ahi hi.
Gomer’ tapate: Ashkenaz, Rifath le Togarmah ahi hi.
Javan’ tapate: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim le Dodanim ahi hi.
Hihte pen tuipi gei-a teeng mite’ pulepa ahi uh hi. Amaute’ leitangah amau’ kampau ciat zangin, a beh, a minamin a om uh hi.
Ham’ tapate: Kush, Egypt, Put le Kanaan ahi hi.
Kush’ tapate: Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah le Sabteka ahi hi. Raamah’ tapate: Sheba le Dedan ahi hi.
Kush in Nimrod kici tapa khat nei a, amah pen leitungah a vanglian masa mi ahi hi.
Amah pen Topa’ mai-ah a minthang sabengpa zong ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin, “Topa in Nimrod bangin a minthang sabengpa hong suaksak tahen,” kici hi.
Ama kumpi gam kipatna Babel, Erek le Akkad hi a, tuate khempeuh Shinar gam sungah om hi.
Tua gam panin Assiria gam sungah amah pai-in Nineveh, Rehoboth-Ir, Kalah le
Nineveh le Kalah kikal-a om Resen khuapite a sat hi. Tua Kalah khuapi pen khuapi lian ahi hi.
Egypt pen Lud mite, Anam mite, Lehab mite, Naftuh mite,
Pathru mite, Kasluh mite (Filistia mite’ pianna) le Kaftor mite’ pianna pupi ahi hi.
Kanaan pen ama sung pan a suak masa Sidon, Heth,
le Jebus mite, Amor mite, Girgash mite,
Hiv mite, Arki mite, Sin mite,
Arvad mite, Zemari mite le Hamath mite’ pianna pupi ahi hi. Tua khit ciangin Kanaan mite kizelthang hi.
Kanaan mite’ gam pen Sidon panin kipanin Gerar lam manawhin Gaza ciang dong ban a, Sodom lam panin Gomorrah, Admah le Lasha gei-a Zeboiim ciang dong ban hi.
Hihte pen a innkuan, a kampau, a leitang, a minamin Ham’ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Eber mi khempeuh’ pianna pupi, Jafeth’ u, Shem’ sung panin zong tate hong piang hi.
Shem’ tapate: Elam, Asshur, Arpakshad, Lud le Aram ahi hi.
Aram’ tapate: Uz, Hul, Gether le Mash ahi hi.
Arpakshad in Shelah kici tapa khat nei a, Shelah in Eber kici tapa khat mah nei hi.
Eber’ sung panin tapa nih suak a, khat’ min pen Peleg ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama hunin leitung kikhen hi. A sanggampa’ min pen Joktan ahi hi.
Joktan pen Almodad, Shelef, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Obal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ofir, Havilah le Jobab’ pianna pa ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh Joktan’ tapate ahi hi.
Amau’ tenna gam pen Mesha panin kipanin Sefar lamah nisuahna gam mual tung dong ban hi.
Hihte pen a innkuan, a kampau, a leitang, a minamin Shem’ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Hihte pen Noah’ tapate innkuan, a khangsimna tawh kizui-in amau’ minam ahi hi. Tuiciin tun khit ciangin hihte tung panin leitungah minamte kizelthang hi.
Tua laitakin leitung buppi in kampau khat le kammal tawmno bek nei hi.
Amaute, nisuahna lamah lal uh a, Shinar gam sungah zanglei mun khat mu-in tua lai-ah a teeng uh hi.
Amaute khatlekhat kiangah, “Hong pai un, leiseek seekin limtakin hal ni,” kici uh hi. Amaute in suang dingin leiseek nei uh a, a buan dingin kultal tui nei uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hong pai un, leitung buppi-ah eite i kithehthang gawp loh nadingin ei adingin khuapi khat bawlin, a dawn in vantung a ban ding tausang khat lamin, eite’ minthan nading khat bawl ni,” ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihingte’ lamsa khuapi le tausangpi a en dingin Topa hong paisuk hi.

Topa in, “En un, amaute minam khat hi uh a, amaute khempeuh in kampau khat nei uh hi. Hih pen amau’ sep ding a kipatna bek ahi hi. Tu-in sep dinga amau’ vaihawmte amau adingin hi thei nawn lo ding hi.
Hong pai un, amaute khatlekhat’ thugen a kitheih loh nadingun eite paisukin amau’ kampau va kitukalhsak ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tua lai panin leitung khempeuh ah amaute thehthang a, a khuapi bawl uh a tawp uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a min Babel kici hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in tua munah leitung khempeuh’ kampau kitukalhsak hi. Tua lai mun panin Topa in leitung khempeuh ah amaute a thehthang hi.
Hihte pen Shem’ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Shem kum zakhat a phak, tuiciin tun khit kum nih ciangin, amah in Arpakshad kici tapa khat nei hi.
Arpakshad a suah khit ciangin Shem kum zakhat nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Arpakshad kum sawmthum le kum nga a phak khit ciangin, amah in Shelah kici tapa khat nei hi.
Shelah a suah khit ciangin Arpakshad kum zali le kum sawmthum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Shelah kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin Eber kici tapa khat nei hi.
Eber’ suah khit ciangin Shelah kum zali le kum sawmthum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Eber kum sawmthum le kum li a phak khit ciangin amah in Peleg kici tapa khat nei hi.
Peleg a suah khit ciangin Eber kum zali le kum sawmthum nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Peleg kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin amah in Reu kici tapa khat nei hi.
Reu a suah khit ciangin Peleg kum zanih le kum kua nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Reu kum sawmthum le nih a phak khit ciangin amah in Serug kici tapa khat nei hi.
Serug a suah khit ciangin Reu kum zanih le kum sagih nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Serug kum sawmthum a phak khit ciangin amah in Nahor kici tapa khat nei hi.
Nahor a suah khit ciangin Serug kum zanih nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang nei lai hi.
Nahor kum sawmnih le kua a phak khit ciangin amah in Terah kici tapa khat nei hi.
Terah a suah khit ciangin Nahor kum za le kum sawm le kum kua nungta lai a, tanu le tapa dang neilai hi.
Terah kum sawmsagih a phak khit ciangin amah in Abram, Nahor le Haran a nei hi.
Tu-in Terah’ suanlekhakte hih bang ahi hi. Terah pen Abram, Nahor le Haran’ pa hi a, Haran pen Lot’ pa ahi hi.
Ama pa Terah a sih ma-in ama suahna gam ahi, Khaldea gam Ur khua-ah Haran si hi.
Abram le Nahor in zi nei uh hi. Abram’ zi min Sarai hi a, Nahor’ zi min Milkah hi a, Milkah pen Iskah’ pa Haran’ tanu ahi hi.
Tu-in Sarai ciing a, ta nei lo hi.

Terah in ama tapa Abram le Haran’ tapa, ama tupa ahi Lot le a tapa Abram’ zi ahi a monu Sarai samin, Kanaan gam sungah a pai dingin Khaldea gam Ur khua panin amaute a pai khia khawm uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute Haran a tun uh ciangin tua munah a teeng uh hi.
Terah’ khansung kum zanih le kum nga hi a, Haran-ah Terah a si hi.
Pasian in Abram a Sapna Topa in Abram kiangah, “Na gam, na beh le na pa’ inn panin nang kong lah ding gamah pai in.
Minam lian in kong bawl dinga, thupha hong pia-in, na min liansak ding ka hih manin midangte’ adingin thupha na hi ding hi.
Nang thupha hong piate thupha ka pia dinga, nang hong samsiate ka samsia ding hi. Nang’ thupha ngah bangin thupha a ngah nadingun leitung midang khempeuh in hong ngen ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ gensa bangin Abram pai a, Lot in zong a zui hi. Haran panin a pai khiatin Abram kum sawmsagih le nga a pha hi.
Abram in ama zi Sarai, a sanggampa’ tapa Lot, amau’ kaihkhopsa neihsa khempeuh le Haran-a amau’ neih sila khempeuh samin, Kanaan gamah a pai dingin amaute ding khia uh a, tua gam a tung uh hi.
Abram in tua gam sung nawkin Shekhem mun, Moreh tawsaw phung dong a tung hi. Tua hunin tua lai-ah Kanaan mite teeng lai hi.
Tua ciangin Abram’ tungah Topa kilang a, “Na suanlekhakte tungah hih leitang ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in ama tunga kilang Topa adingin biakna tau khat a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin Bethel panin nisuahna lam mualah amah kin kikin a puanbuk lam a, nitumna lamah Bethel, nisuahna lamah Ai om hi. Tua lai munah zong amah in Topa adingin biakna tau khat bawl a, Topa’ tungah thu a ngen hi.
Abram in a khualzin zom lai a, Negeb gam lam manawhin a pai lai hi.
Kanaan gam sungah kialpi tung hi. Tua kialpi nasia ahih manin tawlkhat sung a om dingin Egypt-ah Abram a paisuk hi.
Egypt gam a tum ding ciangin amah in a zi Sarai’ kiangah, “Nang pen nupi melhoih khat na hihna ka thei hi.
Egypt mite in nang hong muh ciangin amaute in, ‘Hih nu ama zi hi,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kei hong that ding uh a, ahi zongin amaute in nang hong nungtasak ding uh hi.
Nang pen ka sanggamnu ci lehang, nangma hangin kei adingin thu hong hoih zaw dinga, nangma hangin ka suakta thei kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Egypt gam sungah Abram a tun ciangin Egypt mite in tua nupi a mel hoihsa mahmah uh hi.
Faro’ uliante in amah a muh uh ciangin Faro’ kiangah amah phat uh hi. Faro’ inn sungah tua nupi kila hi.
Tua nu’ hangin amah in Abram limbawl mahmah hi. Amah in tuu, bawngtal, latal, pasal nasem, numei nasem, lanu le kalaoh-te a pia hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Abram’ zi Sarai’ huhau-in Faro le a innkuanpihte gimna lianpi thuaksak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro in Abram samin, “Bang hangin hih bangin kei hong bawl na hi hiam? Amah na zi ahihna bang hangin kei kiangah hong gen lo na hi hiam?
Ka zi dingin amah ka lak theih nadingin, ‘Amah ka sanggamnu hi,’ bang hangin hong ci na hi hiam? Tu-in hih lai-ah na zi om hi. Amah la inla pai un,” a ci hi.
Faro in amah tawh kisai-in a mite tungah thu a pia hi. Amaute in a zi le ama neih khempeuh tawh lampi-ah a kha khia uh hi.
Abram le Lot Kikhen Tua ahih ciangin Egypt panin Abram, a zi, ama neih khempeuh le Lot tawh zong Negeb gam lamah a paito hi.
Abram in ganhing, ngun le kham hau mahmah hi.
Amah Negeb gam pan kipanin Bethel ciang dong, a kipat cil-in a puanbuk omnasa mun Bethel le Ai kikal,
a masa-a biakna tau khat a bawlnasa munah khualzinin a paisuak hi. Tua lai munah Abram in Topa’ tungah thu a ngen hi.
Abram tawh a paikhawm Lot in zong tuuhon, ganhon le puanbukte nei hi.
Tua ahih manin mun khatah a teeng khawm dingin leitang in amau tegel vak zo lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gan neihsate tam mahmah ahih manin amau tegel teeng khawm thei lo uh a,
Abram’ gancingte le Lot’ gancingte kitawng thei zel hi. Tua hun laitakin Kanaan mite le Perez mite tua gamah teeng lai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abram in Lot’ kiangah, “Nang le kei’ kikal, nang’ gancingte le kei’ gancingte’ kikalah kitotna omsak kei ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite beh khat ihi hi.

Na mai-ah gam buppi om hi lo ahi hiam? Kei’ kiang panin nangmah pai khia tawm in. Nang in veilam na lak leh, kei taklamah ka pai ding hi. Tua ahih kei leh zong, nang in taklam na lak leh, kei veilamah ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Lot zong khuadak a, Jordan gun kuam mun khempeuh in limtakin tui ngahin Topa’ huan hitaleh, Zoar lama Egypt gam tawh hitaleh kibang hi, ci-in mu hi. Hih pen Topa in Sodom le Gomorrah a suksiat hun ma ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Lot in ama adingin Jordan gun kuam khempeuh teel a, nisuahna lamah a pai hi. Tua ahih manin amaute kikhen tuak uh hi.
Kuam sunga khuapite’ lakah Lot teengin, a puanbukte Sodom ciang dongah khinin a om laitakin Kanaan gam sungah Abram teeng hi.
Tua laitakin Sodom mite migi lo hi a, Topa’ tungah nakpitakin a khialte ahi hi.
Ama kiang panin Lot a pai khiat khit ciangin Topa in Abram’ kiangah, “Khuadak to inla, nangma omna panin leilu lam, leitaw lam, nisuahna lam le nitumna lam en in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na muh gam khempeuh nang le na suanlekhakte kong pia paisuak ding hi.
Na suanlekhakte, leitung leivui zahin tampi ka phasak ding hi. Mi khatpeuh in leitung leivui a sim theih leh na suanlekhakte zong kisim thei ding hi.
Ding inla, gamdung gamvai kantanin pai in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Abram in a puanbuk khinin, Hebron gam sung, Mamre tawsawte gei-ah hong pai-in a teeng hi. Tua lai munah Topa adingin biakna tau khat a bawl hi.
